body_html:
Thank you all for the help,
tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.5 -> build failed (version incompatibility)
I tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.0.3.0 --> build failed
I tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.0.4.0 --> build was success!
I checked the cudnn.h file for 7.0.3.0 , it didn't had the declaration of "cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward", whereas 7.0.4.0 's cudnn.h had the definition. This issue could be closed now.

body:
Thank you all for the help,
tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.5 -> build failed (version incompatibility)
I tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.0.3.0  --> build failed
I tried cuda-7 + cudnn 7.0.4.0  --> build was success!
I checked the cudnn.h file for 7.0.3.0 , it didn't had the declaration of "cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward", whereas 7.0.4.0 's cudnn.h had the definition. This issue could be closed now.
